posts.post_content:
Found another one, so this is expendable.  Was in a PSA 2 holder.  Looks better than it is... paper loss on the right side of the front is somewhat camouflaged.   I need a new scanner... everything appears slanted... which isn't the case.

Asking $120 delivered; paypal preferred. Will consider trades.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/epdg/7223/kelley-joe[/IMG]
